prompts: Create a Flying-type Pokemon that has a heart-shaped body and large bat-like wings.
Imagine a Psychic-type Pokemon with a teal body and a playful personality.
Show me a Pokemon that combines cute features and bat wings, perfect for urban environments.
Generate a unique design for a Pokemon that loves to flit between trees in a forest.
Make a Pokemon with blue and gray colors that can be found in caves and mountains.
Design a creature with a soft body and sharp wings, representing a mix of playfulness and agility.
Give me an idea for a Pokemon that can navigate both urban and natural habitats with ease.
